With multiple visits to cafes, specifically the Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf, socializing over coffee is part of her routine. She enjoys engaging in various leisure activities, including trips to the dog park and library, suggesting she values both companionship and quiet time with books. Socially agreeable and emotionally stable, she effortlessly connects with those around her. This dynamic blend of traits reflects her balanced approach to life, with an openness to both shopping and enjoying recreational outlets.
